```{r 2}
filename <- "data/WW SARS-COV-2 Data V3.xlsx"
CovidFileName = "data/covid.csv"
#filename <- "data/wastewater/UW and MMSD Report for SARS-Cov-2 Influent Samples 12.08.20vFinal.xlsx"
```

```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
tmpfn <- function(N1, N2) {
  AVG <- sqrt(N1 * N2)
  AVG <- ifelse(is.na(N1), N2, AVG)
  AVG <- ifelse(is.na(N2), N1, AVG)
}
missing_codes <- c("","NA","0","Undetected","Not Detected",
                   "Field Parameters to be filled in", 
                   "Inhibited-to be re-ran", "#DIV/0!")
sheets <- excel_sheets(filename)
water_MMSD <- read_excel(filename,
                    na = missing_codes,
                    col_types = c("text", "date", rep("numeric", 9), "text"),
                    sheet = 1) %>%
  rename(Comment = "...12")
water_Interceptors <- read_excel(filename,
                    na = missing_codes,
                    col_types = c("text", "date", rep("numeric", 8), "text"),
                    sheet = 2) %>%
  rename(Comment = "...11") %>%
  mutate(TSS = NA,
         Site = ifelse(Site == "MMSD P02", "MMSD P2", Site),
         Site = ifelse(Site == "MMSD P07", "MMSD P7", Site),
         Site = ifelse(Site == "MMSD P08", "MMSD P8", Site)) %>%
  select(1:5, TSS, everything())
water_UW_Dorms <- read_excel(filename,
                    na = missing_codes,
                    col_types = c("text", "date", rep("numeric", 9), rep("text", 1)),
                    sheet = 3) %>%
  rename(Comment = "...12")
water <- 
  bind_rows(water_MMSD,
            water_Interceptors,
            water_UW_Dorms) %>%
  rename(Date = "Collection Date",
         pH = "pH (SU)",
         Total_Flow = "Total Flow (MGD)",
         Conductivity = "Conductivity (uS/CM@25C)",
         N1 = "N1 (GC/L)",
         N2 = "N2 (GC/L)",
         PMMoV = "PMMoV (GC/L)",
         Pct_BCoV = "% Recovery (BCoV)",
         temp='TSS (mg/L)') %>%
  filter(!is.na(Site)) %>%
  mutate(AVG = tmpfn(N1, N2),
         wt = 2 - is.na(N1) - is.na(N2),
         Site = ifelse(Site == "UW-D", "UW-LakeShore", Site),
         Site = ifelse(Site == "UW-S", "UW-Sellery", Site))%>%
  mutate(TSS=ifelse(is.na(TSS),temp,TSS))%>%
  select(-temp)
```


```{r}
covidData = read.csv(CovidFileName)%>%
  mutate(ServiceID = ifelse(ServiceID=="MMSD","Madison",paste("MMSD P",ServiceID,sep="")),Date = as.Date(Date , format = "%m/%d/%y"))%>%
  rename(Site=ServiceID)%>%
  group_by(Site)%>%
  #mutate(roll=rollmean(Cases/Tests,k = 1, fill = NA))
  mutate(roll=Cases/Tests)

MergedData=full_join(covidData,water,by = c("Date","Site"))


Inner=inner_join(covidData,water,by = c("Date","Site"))
```

Variables Vs. Date

```{r, echo=FALSE, dpi=600, fig.width=12, fig.height=12}
colo=setNames(object = scales::hue_pal()(length(unique(water$Site))), nm = unique(water$Site))
    
myplots <- list()
myplots[[1]]=MergedData%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=Conductivity,color=Site))+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  scale_y_log10()
myplots[[3]]=MergedData%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=Pct_BCoV,color=Site))+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  scale_y_log10()
myplots[[5]]=Inner%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=roll,color=Site))
myplots[[7]]=Inner%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=Cases,color=Site))
myplots[[9]]=MergedData%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=pH,color=Site))
myplots[[11]]=MergedData%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=TSS,color=Site))
myplots[[13]]=MergedData%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  scale_color_manual(values = colo)+
  geom_smooth(aes(y=log(N1),color=Site))
a=ggarrange(plotlist = myplots,ncol = 1, nrow = 7)
#roll,Cases,pH,Total_Flow,TSS,N1,N2,PMMoV,Pct_BCoV,TSS (mg/L)
```

correlation conductivity vs variables

```{r}
data.frame(
roll=cor.test(Inner$Conductivity,Inner$roll)[[4]],
Cases=cor.test(Inner$Conductivity,Inner$Cases)[[4]],
logN1=cor.test(MergedData$Conductivity,log(MergedData$N1))[[4]],
pH=cor.test(MergedData$Conductivity,MergedData$pH)[[4]],
TSS=cor.test(MergedData$Conductivity,MergedData$TSS)[[4]],
Pct_BCoV=cor.test(MergedData$Conductivity,MergedData$Pct_BCoV)[[4]]
)
#roll,Cases,pH,Total_Flow,TSS,N1,N2,PMMoV,Pct_BCoV,TSS (mg/L)
```
